home.subtitle: kPaste is a free service for sending encrypted messages to your contacts.
home.text: Infomaniak respects your privacy and cannot read your messages. kPaste is end-to-end encrypted and stores your data exclusively in Switzerland.
home.title: Share your messages securely like a secret agent!

meta.title: Infomaniak Paste 🔐 Send messages like a secret agent

info.password: Transmit this password through another channel for added security.

input.tooltip: My message is of the utmost importance and needs more space

label.destroy: Delete the message after reading it
label.password: Protect the message with a password

password.input: Enter the password to unlock this message

text.destroy: This message can be read only once. It will then be permanently deleted.
text.password: Your recipient will need to enter this password to view your message.
text.validity: After that, the message will self-destruct permanently 💥

info.wrong_password: Hmm, that password doesn’t seem to match this message

label.destroy: Don’t close this window because the secure link can only be used once!
label.message: Here’s the message you’ve just been sent

link.new_paste: Fancy pretending to be a secret agent?

new.description: A secure link has been generated. Share this link with the contacts intended to read your secret message.
new.title: Autoclave procedure by convergence. Yes, great!

subtitle.error: The message has self-destructed or never existed
subtitle.password: This message is protected with a password.

text.error: Luckily it wasn’t about saving the world
